Computer Science Master's Student @ University of Chicago

Home Projects Resume

Cache Emulator

Emulation of the interactions between the CPU, RAM and L1 Cache via three typical high-performance testing algorithms: daxpy, matrix multiplication and blocked matrix multiplication.
Github

Mersenne Scan

MIPS and C implementations to scan through \(p\) values to find Mersenne primes (i.e. primes of the form \(M_p = 2^p - 1\)).
Github
